description: React component for displaying a list of books with cover images, quick actions (view details, add to cart), fallback image handling, and inline badges for feedback.

methods.name: ProductList
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a grid of book cards with interactive actions.

methods.name: handleImgError
methods.description: Handles image load errors, substitutes fallback image, and prevents infinite error loops.

methods.name: handleAddToCart
methods.description: Handles add to cart action; logs to console and displays transient badge.
